name: Data Ball
description: In a distant corner of the universe exists an ancient supercomputer plagued by malfunctioning circuits and corrupted data. Take control of one of its spherical maintenance drones and command a range of abilities as you progress through ever-more challenging levels.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core2 Duo processor (or 64-Bit AMD equivalent) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Dedicated Card w/ 1GB VRAM Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
